title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Cognitive Load Reduction for Enhancing Learning Outcomes in English-Mediated Accounting Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting concepts and intermediate English proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: 20% improvement in learning efficiency among English-speaking groups in conceptually oriented accounting courses.
35% increase in understanding of complex accounting concepts through cognitive load management strategies.
85% achievement in self-directed learning engagement using smartphone-based learning materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
